plot: Nicolas Philibert goes to America after killing a French aristocrat. On his return he tries to divorce his wife, Charlotte, but when he sees others trying to woo her his own interest is rekindled.
title: Gracias y desgracias de un casado del año II
plot_es: Nicolas Philibert goes to America after killing a French aristocrat. On his return he tries to divorce his wife, Charlotte, but when he sees others trying to woo her his own interest is rekindled.
plot_en: Nicolas Philibert goes to America after killing a French aristocrat. On his return he tries to divorce his wife, Charlotte, but when he sees others trying to woo her his own interest is rekindled.

cast.role: Nicolas Philibert - un candidat au divorce entraîné malgré lui dans la Révolution française
cast.name: Jean-Paul Belmondo

cast.role: Charlotte Philibert - la femme de Nicolas
cast.name: Marlène Jobert

cast.role: Pauline de Guérandes - une riche héritière
cast.name: Laura Antonelli
